subject: Re: new vs ->new
body:
On Jun 10, 7:12 pm, rvtol+n...@isolution.nl (Dr.Ruud) wrote:
> "Adriano Ferreira" schreef:
>
> > Definitely go with
> >  my $test = Some::Module->new;
>
> or even with:
>    my $test = Some::Module::->new();

For the love of $DEITY, why?

Paul Lalli
